hero.title: Connecting Farmers Directly to Buyers
hero.subtitle: No middlemen. No post-harvest loss. Just fair prices and fresh produce.

features.title: Everything You Need to Trade Successfully
features.subtitle: Built specifically for African farmers and buyers, with features that work even in low-connectivity areas.

smartSearch.title: Smart Search & Filters
smartSearch.desc: Find exactly what you need with advanced search by produce type, location, quantity, and price range.

locationMatching.title: Location-Based Matching
locationMatching.desc: Connect with farmers and buyers in your area to reduce transportation costs and ensure freshness.

smsAlerts.title: Real-Time SMS Alerts
smsAlerts.desc: Get instant notifications for new orders, price changes, and buyer inquiries directly to your phone.

priceTransparency.title: Market Price Transparency
priceTransparency.desc: Access real-time market prices to make informed decisions and negotiate fair deals.

verifiedUsers.title: Verified Users
verifiedUsers.desc: Trade with confidence knowing all users are verified for authenticity and reliability.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First Design
mobileFirst.desc: Access the platform from any device, optimized for mobile users with limited connectivity.

howItWorks.title: How FarmLink Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, straightforward, and designed for everyone - from tech-savvy buyers to farmers with basic phones.

createAccount.title: Create Your Account
createAccount.desc: Sign up as a farmer or buyer in minutes. Verify your identity to start trading.

listProduce.title: List or Browse Produce
listProduce.desc: Farmers post their available produce. Buyers search and filter to find what they need.

connect.title: Connect & Negotiate
connect.desc: Contact each other directly through the platform. Negotiate prices and quantities.

getUpdates.title: Get SMS Updates
getUpdates.desc: Receive instant SMS notifications for orders, inquiries, and price updates.

problem.title: Farmers Are Losing Money Every Day

card1.title: Post-Harvest Losses
card1.desc: 30-40% of produce goes to waste due to lack of market access and poor storage facilities.

card2.title: Middlemen Exploitation
card2.desc: Farmers receive only a fraction of the final selling price while middlemen take the majority.

card3.title: No Market Information
card3.desc: Lack of real-time pricing data leaves farmers vulnerable to unfair negotiations.

card4.title: Climate Change
card4.desc: Unpredictable rain and sudden droughts mean traditional planting seasons are a gamble, leading to total crop failure.

card5.title: Pests & Crop Disease
card5.desc: A new pest or disease can wipe out an entire farm in 48 hours, with no expert to ask for help.

card1.title: Direct Connections
card1.desc: Connect farmers directly with buyers, eliminating middlemen and ensuring fair prices for both parties.

card2.title: Transparent Pricing
card2.desc: Real-time market prices visible to all users, ensuring fair negotiations and informed decisions.

card3.title: SMS Notifications
card3.desc: Instant SMS alerts for new orders, price updates, and buyer inquiries - no internet required.

card4.title: AI Planting Advisor
card4.desc: Our co-pilot analyzes climate data and forecasts to tell you the *exact optimal week* to plant your crops.

card5.title: Instant Disease Scanner
card5.desc: Just take a picture of a sick leaf, and our AI will instantly identify the disease and give you low-cost treatment options.
